```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)

cur_yr = 2018
```

## Raw output 

```{r biomass, echo = FALSE }
biomass <- read.csv("../data/redcrab/biomass.csv")
biomass %>% 
  filter(Year == cur_yr) %>% 
  select(-harvest) -> biomass_c
kable(biomass_c, digits = 2)
```
